globals.title: Tec Gap Calculator
globals.description: Page to calculate gaps and measurements for glass installation of Tec products
globals.alert: The calculator is intended exclusively to support the interpretation and application of the formulas presented in the product manual, and the accuracy of the data and measurements entered in the tables is the sole responsibility of the user.

infosPage.title: How to use Tec's gap calculator

steps.text: Fill in the fields with the number of panels and doors.
Enter the lock deduction measurements for each of the doors.
The final glass measurements will be displayed in the blue box.
To share, click on the 'Print version' button.
